entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then rain. Rain mixed with snow late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
